## ============================================================== ## Displays results of a people request ## ============================================================== ## Inputs : ## - $hql, the $hql request (Mandatory!) ## - $howMany, the nb of people to display (default 50) ## - $offset, where to start from getting results (default 0) ## - $outputStyle, displays small hcard ("short", default) or long ("long") ## - $withLinks, display links (true/false) default false ## ============================================================== #if(!$howMany || $howMany=="") #set($howMany=50) #end #if(!$offset || $offset=="") #set($offset=0) #end #if(!$outputStyle || $outputStyle=="") #set($outputStyle="small") #end #set($total = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql).size()) #foreach($user in $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, $howMany, $offset)) #if($outputStyle=="small") #smallhcard($user) #else #hcard($user) #end #end
#if($withLinks) #set($pages = $total/$howMany) #if($pages>0) #if($offset>0) #set($off=${offset}-${howMany}) Previous - #end 0 #foreach($page in [1..$pages]) #set($off=$howMany*$page) $page #end #if($offset+$howMany<$total) #set($off=$offset+$howMany) - Next #end #end #end
